channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road markings worn off, parked cars blocking crossing, 7th September
item.description:
The road markings have worn off on this crossing and people are constantly parking and blocking it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Bury Street West, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven road - middle of road, 7th September
item.description:
The middle of the road by no. 39 has an even surface and is a major trip hazaed to pedestrians. I tripped and fell this morning while crossing the road. Resulting in facial injuries, sprains, cuts and grazes. This surface had some temporary work done a while ago but its back to its original poor state.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chessington Avenue, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet
